name: Rock of Ages (itch)
description:
**Please note that none of the assets used in the project were created by me. The aim of this project was to create a trash game using free, creative commons assets from the Unity Asset Store, itch.io and elsewhere on the internet. You can find references to all these assets in the AssetList.txt included**

Rock of Ages is a Virtual Museum that showcases assets gathered from across the internet. Most of them are rocks, and the rest are objects to compliment the rocks. While brainstorming for this project I found there was a lot of different rock models, despite all being fairly similar and, compared to other objects, quite mundane. 

The original plan was simply to highlight some of the interesting elements of these objects, but this game now includes more humour and a little bit of narrative to flesh that out.

Controls:
W A S D : Movement
Mouse : Look

https://github.com/Natbugasaurus/Virtual-Museum
